Class Pokemon

java.lang.Object
model.Pokemon
public class Pokemon extends Object
The Pokemon class is part of MODEL. It holds the behaviour and data of a single Pokemon. Attributes include name, pokedexnum, types, levels, stats and moves. This class should not handle user interaction or rendering.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    static final int
    MAX_MOVES
    The maximum number of moves a Pokemon can have.

  • Field Details

    • MAX_MOVES

      public static final int MAX_MOVES
      The maximum number of moves a Pokemon can have.
      See Also:
      • Constant Field Values

  • Constructor Details

    • Pokemon

      public Pokemon()
      Constructs a new empty Pokemon. Fields are set with setters.

    • Pokemon

      public Pokemon(int pokedexNum, String name, String type1, int baseLevel, int evolvesFrom, int evolvesTo, int evolutionLevel, int hp, int atk, int def, int spd)
      Constructs a new Pokemon without type2 and moves. Missing values are to be manually set, and move set defaults to Tackle and Defend.
      Parameters:
      pokedexNum - the pokedex number of the Pokemon
      name - the name of the Pokemon
      type1 - the Pokemon typing
      baseLevel - the starting level
      evolvesFrom - the original pokedex number to evolve out of
      evolvesTo - the new pokedex number to evolve into
      evolutionLevel - the level required to evolve
      hp - the hp stats
      atk - the atk stats
      def - the def stats
      spd - the spd stats

    • Pokemon

      public Pokemon(int pokedexNum, String name, String type1, String type2, int baseLevel, int evolvesFrom, int evolvesTo, int evolutionLevel, int hp, int atk, int def, int spd, String[] moveSet, String heldItem)
      Constructs a new Pokemon.
      Parameters:
      pokedexNum - the pokedex number of the Pokemon
      name - the name of the Pokemon
      type1 - the Pokemon typing
      type2 - the Pokemon 2nd typing
      baseLevel - the starting level
      evolvesFrom - the original pokedex number to evolve out of
      evolvesTo - the new pokedex number to evolve into
      evolutionLevel - the level required to evolve
      hp - the hp stats
      atk - the atk stats
      def - the def stats
      spd - the spd stats
      moveSet - [] an array of moves
      heldItem - the item the pokemon is currently holding

      Returns:

    • getType1

      public String getType1()
      Returns the primary type of this Pokemon.
      Returns:
      the first type (e.g., "Fire", "Water")

    • getType2

      public String getType2()
      Returns the secondary type of this Pokemon, if any.
      Returns:
      the second type, or null if none

    • getBaseLevel

      public int getBaseLevel()
      Returns the base level of this Pokemon. This represents the level it starts at.
      Returns:
      the base level

    • getEvolvesFrom

      public int getEvolvesFrom()
      Returns the Pokedex number of the Pokemon it evolves from.
      Returns:
      the Pokedex number of the previous evolution

    • getEvolvesTo

      public int getEvolvesTo()
      Returns the Pokedex number of the Pokémon this one evolves to.
      Returns:
      the Pokedex number of the next evolution

    • getEvolutionLevel

      public int getEvolutionLevel()
      Returns the level required for this Pokemon to evolve.
      Returns:
      the evolution level

    • setMoveSet

      public void setMoveSet(String[] moves)
      Sets the moveset of this Pokemon. This method adds the moves from the given array to the current moveset and increments the move count.
      Parameters:
      moves - an array of move names to assign

    • setMoveSetCount

      public void setMoveSetCount(int count)
      Sets the number of moves in this Pokemon's moveset.
      Parameters:
      count - the move count

    • setHeldItem

      public void setHeldItem(String item)
      Sets the held item of this Pokemon.
      Parameters:
      item - the held item, or null if none

    • cry

      public void cry()
      Cry behvaiour of this Pokemon. Prints the pokemons name followed by a "cries!" message
